sourcesContent: import styles from './NavbarCartButton.module.css' import CartIcon from './CartIcon' import cartContext from '../store/cartContext' import { useContext } from 'react' const NavbarCartButton = ({setShowCart}) => { const context = useContext(cartContext) // const numberOfItems = context.items.length return } export default NavbarCartButton
